articles.description: India have been rewarded for their clinical series sweep of the West Indies by putting further ground between themselves and Pakistan while maintaining third place on the latest Men's ODI Team Rankings.

articles.title: 'Dinda came and started glaring at Sachin. I was like, 'ye kya kar raha hai'' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The former India batter recalled an incident between Ashoke Dinda and Sachin Tendulkar when the bowler hit the India star on his elbow during a match in 2007.
articles.content: Former India batter Sachin Tendulkar is widely regarded as one of the greatest in the history of the game. A record-holder for most runs in both, ODIs and Tests, Tendulkar commanded a huge respect as… [+2374 chars]

articles.title: IND vs WI 2022, Watch: Axar Patel Cleans up Brandon King With a Stunning Delivery - News18
articles.description: Axar bowled a straighter delivery while King got late to bring his bat down to play the spin. The ball went right in between bat and body to send the Windies into trouble
